name: CUSTOM Hero #13

heading_mt_mobile.label: Heading Margin Top - Mobile
heading_mt_mobile.description: Apply heading margin when video is positioned at the bottom on mobile.

video_url.label: Video Embed from Url
video_url.description: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_bottom_mobile.label: Video Bottom on Mobile
video_bottom_mobile.description: Apply heading margin to fix body gap when video is positioned at the bottom on mobile.
